trans-unit.source: Defines the properties for a type.
trans-unit.target: 定義型別的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A `PropertyBuilder` is always associated with a `TypeBuilder`.
trans-unit.target: A`PropertyBuilder`一律與相關聯`TypeBuilder`。

trans-unit.source: The `TypeBuilder`.
trans-unit.target: `TypeBuilder`。

trans-unit.source: `DefineProperty` method will return a new `PropertyBuilder` to a client.
trans-unit.target: `DefineProperty` 方法會傳回新`PropertyBuilder`給用戶端。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates how to implement properties in a dynamic type using a `PropertyBuilder` obtained via <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineProperty%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to create the property framework and an associated <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder> to implement the IL logic within the property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作中使用動態類型的屬性`PropertyBuilder`透過取得<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.DefineProperty%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>建立屬性架構和相關聯<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.MethodBuilder>實作 IL 內的邏輯屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="MethodBuilder" /> object that represents the other method.
trans-unit.target: 表示另一個方法的 <see langword="MethodBuilder" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds one of the other methods associated with this property.
trans-unit.target: 加入其中一個與這個屬性相關聯的其他方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="mdBuilder" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="mdBuilder" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> has been called on the enclosing type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> 已在封入型別上被呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Gets the attributes for this property.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個屬性 (Property) 的屬性 (Attribute)。

trans-unit.source: Attributes of this property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性 (Property) 的屬性 (Attribute)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the property can be read.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否可讀取屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this property can be read; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可讀取這個屬性，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Boolean property indicating if the property can be read.
trans-unit.target: 指出是否可以讀取屬性的布林值屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the property does not have a get accessor, it cannot be read.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性沒有 get 存取子，如果它無法讀取。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the property can be written to.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否可寫入屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this property can be written to; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可寫入屬性，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Boolean property indicating if the property can be written to.
trans-unit.target: 指出是否可以寫入至屬性的布林值屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the property does not have a set accessor, it cannot be written to.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性沒有 set 存取子，如果它無法寫入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the class that declares this member.
trans-unit.target: 取得宣告這個成員的類別。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Type" /> object for the class that declares this member.
trans-unit.target: 宣告這個成員之類別的 <see langword="Type" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether non-public methods should be returned in the <see langword="MethodInfo" /> array.
trans-unit.target: 指示非公用方法是否應傳回到 <see langword="MethodInfo" /> 陣列中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if non-public methods are to be included; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果非公用方法要包含在內，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of the public and non-public <see langword="get" /> and <see langword="set" /> accessors on this property.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個屬性上的公用 (Public) 和非公用 <see langword="get" /> 和 <see langword="set" /> 存取子的陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see langword="MethodInfo" /> containing the matching public or non-public accessors, or an empty array if matching accessors do not exist on this property.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="MethodInfo" /> 型別陣列 (包含相符的公用或非公用存取子) 或空陣列 (如果這個屬性上不存在相符的存取子)。

trans-unit.source: To get the accessors of a property, reflect on the property's parent type using Type.GetType or Assembly.GetType, retrieve the Reflection property object from the type, and call PropertyInfo.GetAccessors.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得的屬性存取子，屬性的父類型使用 Type.GetType 或 Assembly.GetType 上反映，反映的屬性物件擷取自類型，並呼叫 PropertyInfo.GetAccessors。

trans-unit.source: This method is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the custom attributes defined on this property.
trans-unit.target: 傳回所有在這個屬性 (Property) 上定義的自訂屬性 (Attribute)。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="true" />, walks up this property's inheritance chain to find the custom attributes
trans-unit.target: 如果為 <see langword="true" />，則沿著這個屬性 (Property) 的繼承 (Inheritance) 鏈結往上尋找自訂屬性 (Attribute)

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of all the custom attributes for this property.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個屬性 (Property) 的所有自訂屬性 (Attribute) 陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of all the custom attributes.
trans-unit.target: 所有自訂屬性的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Reflect on the property's parent type using Type.GetType or Assembly.GetType, retrieve the Reflection property object from the type, and call PropertyInfo.GetCustomAttributes.
trans-unit.target: 反映屬性的父類型使用 Type.GetType 或 Assembly.GetType、 反映的屬性物件擷取自類型，以及呼叫 PropertyInfo.GetCustomAttributes。

trans-unit.source: This method is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這個方法。

trans-unit.source: An array of custom attributes identified by type.
trans-unit.target: 由型別識別的自訂屬性陣列。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="true" />, walks up this property's inheritance chain to find the custom attributes.
trans-unit.target: 如果為 <see langword="true" />，則沿著這個屬性 (Property) 的繼承鍊結往上尋找自訂屬性 (Attribute)。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of custom attributes identified by <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回由 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 識別的自訂屬性陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of custom attributes defined on this reflected member, or <see langword="null" /> if no attributes are defined on this member.
trans-unit.target: 在這個反映成員上定義的自訂屬性陣列，或 <see langword="null" /> (如果這個成員上沒有定義任何屬性)。

trans-unit.source: Reflect on the property's parent type using Type.GetType or Assembly.GetType, retrieve the Reflection property object from the type, and call PropertyInfo.GetCustomAttributes.
trans-unit.target: 反映屬性的父類型使用 Type.GetType 或 Assembly.GetType、 反映的屬性物件擷取自類型，以及呼叫 PropertyInfo.GetCustomAttributes。

trans-unit.source: This method is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether non-public get accessors should be returned.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否應傳回非公用 get 存取子。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if non-public methods are to be included; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果非公用方法要包含在內，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the public and non-public get accessor for this property.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個屬性的公用和非公用 get 存取子。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="MethodInfo" /> object representing the get accessor for this property, if <paramref name="nonPublic" /> is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="MethodInfo" /> 物件，表示這個屬性的 get 存取子 (如果 <paramref name="nonPublic" /> 為 <see langword="true" />)。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="null" /> if <paramref name="nonPublic" /> is <see langword="false" /> and the get accessor is non-public, or if <paramref name="nonPublic" /> is <see langword="true" /> but no get accessors exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="nonPublic" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，並且 get 存取子為非公用，或者，如果 <paramref name="nonPublic" /> 為 <see langword="false" />，但 get 存取子不存在，則傳回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: To get the getter of a property, reflect on the property's parent type using Type.GetType or Assembly.GetType, retrieve the Reflection property object from the type, and call PropertyInfo.GetGetMethod.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得屬性的 getter，反映使用 Type.GetType 或 Assembly.GetType 屬性的父類型、 反映的屬性物件擷取自類型，並呼叫 PropertyInfo.GetGetMethod。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of all the index parameters for the property.
trans-unit.target: 傳回屬性的所有索引參數陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see langword="ParameterInfo" /> containing the parameters for the indexes.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="ParameterInfo" /> 類型的陣列，包含索引的參數。

trans-unit.source: To get the index parameters of a property, reflect on the property's parent type using Type.GetType or Assembly.GetType, retrieve the Reflection property object from the type, and call PropertyInfo.GetIndexParameters.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得屬性的索引參數，反映使用 Type.GetType 或 Assembly.GetType 屬性的父類型、 反映的屬性物件擷取自類型，並呼叫 PropertyInfo.GetIndexParameters。

trans-unit.source: This method is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the accessor should be returned if it is non-public.
trans-unit.target: 指出若為非公用存取子，是否應該傳回。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if non-public methods are to be included; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果非公用方法要包含在內，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the set accessor for this property.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個屬性的 set 存取子。

trans-unit.source: The property's <see langword="Set" /> method, or <see langword="null" />, as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的 <see langword="Set" /> 方法或 <see langword="null" />，如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Value
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> 值

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Condition
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 條件

trans-unit.source: </description></listheader><item><term> A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> object representing the Set method for this property.
trans-unit.target: </description></listheader><item><term><see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 物件，表示這個屬性的 Set 方法。

trans-unit.source: </term><description> The set accessor is public.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> set 存取子為公用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="nonPublic" /> is true and non-public methods can be returned.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="nonPublic" /> 為 true，可傳回非公用方法。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> null
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> null

trans-unit.source: </term><description><paramref name="nonPublic" /> is true, but the property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: </term><description><paramref name="nonPublic" /> 為 true，但屬性為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="nonPublic" /> is false and the set accessor is non-public.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="nonPublic" /> 為 false，且 set 存取子為非公用。

trans-unit.source: To get the setter of a property, reflect on the property's parent type using Type.GetType or Assembly.GetType, retrieve the Reflection property object from the type, and call PropertyInfo.GetSetMethod.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得的屬性 setter，反映使用 Type.GetType 或 Assembly.GetType 屬性的父類型、 反映的屬性物件擷取自類型，並呼叫 PropertyInfo.GetSetMethod。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the property by calling the getter.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫 getter 取得屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The object whose property value will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 其屬性值將被傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: Optional index values for indexed properties.
trans-unit.target: 索引屬性的選擇性索引值。

trans-unit.source: This value should be <see langword="null" /> for non-indexed properties.
trans-unit.target: 非索引屬性的這個值應為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the indexed property by calling the property's getter method.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫屬性的 getter 方法，取得索引屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified indexed property.
trans-unit.target: 指定的索引屬性值。

trans-unit.source: To get the value of a property, reflect on the property's parent type using Type.GetType or Assembly.GetType, retrieve the `Reflection` property object from the type, and call `PropertyInfo.GetValue`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得屬性的值，反映使用 Type.GetType 或 Assembly.GetType 屬性的父類型上，擷取`Reflection`屬性物件類型，並呼叫從`PropertyInfo.GetValue`。

trans-unit.source: This method is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The object whose property value will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 其屬性值將被傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The invocation attribute.
trans-unit.target: 引動過程屬性。

trans-unit.source: This must be a bit flag from <see langword="BindingFlags" /> : <see langword="InvokeMethod" />, <see langword="CreateInstance" />, <see langword="Static" />, <see langword="GetField" />, <see langword="SetField" />, <see langword="GetProperty" />, or <see langword="SetProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: 這必須是 <see langword="BindingFlags" /> 中的位元旗標：<see langword="InvokeMethod" />、<see langword="CreateInstance" />、<see langword="Static" />、<see langword="GetField" />、<see langword="SetField" />、<see langword="GetProperty" /> 或 <see langword="SetProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: A suitable invocation attribute must be specified.
trans-unit.target: 您必須指定適當的引動過程屬性。

trans-unit.source: If a static member is to be invoked, the <see langword="Static" /> flag of <see langword="BindingFlags" /> must be set.
trans-unit.target: 如果將要叫用靜態成員，則必須設定 <see langword="Static" /> 的 <see langword="BindingFlags" /> 旗標。

trans-unit.source: An object that enables the binding, coercion of argument types, invocation of members, and retrieval of <see langword="MemberInfo" /> objects using reflection.
trans-unit.target: 使用反映來啟用繫結、強制引數的類型、成員的引動過程，和擷取 <see langword="MemberInfo" /> 物件的物件。

trans-unit.source: If <c>binder</c> is <see langword="null" />, the default binder is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>Binder</c> 為 <see langword="null" />，則會使用預設 Binder。

trans-unit.source: Optional index values for indexed properties.
trans-unit.target: 索引屬性的選擇性索引值。

trans-unit.source: This value should be <see langword="null" /> for non-indexed properties.
trans-unit.target: 非索引屬性的這個值應為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="CultureInfo" /> object that represents the culture for which the resource is to be localized.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="CultureInfo" /> 物件，表示資源將要為其當地語系化的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the resource is not localized for this culture, the <see langword="CultureInfo.Parent" /> method will be called successively in search of a match.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，如果並未為這個文化特性將資源當地語系化，則將在搜尋相符項目時持續呼叫 <see langword="CultureInfo.Parent" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: If this value is <see langword="null" />, the <see langword="CultureInfo" /> is obtained from the <see langword="CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個值為 <see langword="null" />，則 <see langword="CultureInfo" /> 是取自 <see langword="CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of a property having the specified binding, index, and <see langword="CultureInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得屬性值，其具有指定繫結、索引和 <see langword="CultureInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The property value for <paramref name="obj" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="obj" /> 的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: To get the value of a property, reflect on the property's parent type using Type.GetType or Assembly.GetType, retrieve the Reflection property object from the type, and call PropertyInfo.GetValue.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得屬性的值，反映使用 Type.GetType 或 Assembly.GetType 屬性的父類型、 反映的屬性物件擷取自類型，並呼叫 PropertyInfo.GetValue。

trans-unit.source: This method is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Type" /> object to which the custom attributes are applied.
trans-unit.target: 套用自訂屬性的 <see langword="Type" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to walk up this property's inheritance chain to find the custom attributes.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否要沿著這個屬性 (Property) 的繼承鏈結，往上尋找自訂屬性 (Attribute)。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether one or more instance of <paramref name="attributeType" /> is defined on this property.
trans-unit.target: 指出 <paramref name="attributeType" /> 的一或多個執行個體是否定義在這個屬性上。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if one or more instance of <paramref name="attributeType" /> is defined on this property; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="attributeType" /> 的一或多個執行個體定義在這個屬性上，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Reflect on the property's parent type using Type.GetType or Assembly.GetType, retrieve the Reflection property object from the type, and call PropertyInfo.IsDefined.
trans-unit.target: 反映屬性的父類型使用 Type.GetType 或 Assembly.GetType、 反映的屬性物件擷取自類型，以及呼叫 PropertyInfo.IsDefined。

trans-unit.source: This method is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the module in which the type that declares the current property is being defined.
trans-unit.target: 取得用於定義型別的模組，該型別宣告目前的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Module" /> in which the type that declares the current property is defined.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Module" /> 中定義型別，該型別宣告目前的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property is provided as a convenience for the user.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是使用者提供為了方便起見。

trans-unit.source: It is equivalent to using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.PropertyBuilder.DeclaringType%2A> property to get the type in which the property is declared, and then calling the <xref:System.Type.Module%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.Type> object.
trans-unit.target: 它相當於使用<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.PropertyBuilder.DeclaringType%2A>屬性來取得在其中宣告屬性的型別，然後呼叫<xref:System.Type.Module%2A>屬性產生<xref:System.Type>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of this member.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個成員的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the name of this member.
trans-unit.target: 含有這個成員名稱的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the token for this property.
trans-unit.target: 擷取這個屬性的語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: Read-only.
trans-unit.target: 唯讀。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the token for this property.
trans-unit.target: 擷取這個屬性的語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the field of this property.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個屬性的欄位型別。

trans-unit.source: The type of this property.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性的類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the class object that was used to obtain this instance of <see langword="MemberInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得類別物件，是用來取得這個 <see langword="MemberInfo" /> 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Type" /> object through which this <see langword="MemberInfo" /> object was obtained.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Type" /> 物件，用來取得這個 <see langword="MemberInfo" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的預設值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the default value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性的預設值。

trans-unit.source: `defaultValue` is restricted to the following types: `Boolean`, `SByte`, `Int16`, `Int32`, `Int64`, `Byte`, `UInt16`, `UInt32`, `UInt64`, `Single`, `Double`, `DateTime`, `Char`, `String`, and `Enum`.
trans-unit.target: `defaultValue` 僅限於下列類型： `Boolean`， `SByte`， `Int16`， `Int32`， `Int64`， `Byte`， `UInt16`， `UInt32`， `UInt64`， `Single`， `Double`， `DateTime``Char`， `String`，和`Enum`。

trans-unit.source: If the property type is a reference type, CLS compliance requires `defaultValue` to be `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性型別是參考類型，則需要 cls 符合性`defaultValue`是`null`。

trans-unit.source: However, starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], `defaultValue` can be non-null for reference types as long as the value can be assigned to that reference type.
trans-unit.target: 不過，從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，`defaultValue`為非 null，對於參考類型，只要這個值可以指派給該參考類型。

trans-unit.source: For example, an `Int32` value can be assigned to a property of type <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`Int32`值可以指派給屬性的型別<xref:System.Object>。

trans-unit.source: This is not CLS-compliant, but it can be useful in interop scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 這不符合 CLS 標準，但它可以是 interop 案例中很有用。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> has been called on the enclosing type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> 已在封入型別上被呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The property is not one of the supported types.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性並不是其中一個支援型別。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The type of <paramref name="defaultValue" /> does not match the type of the property.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="defaultValue" /> 的型別不符合屬性的型別。

trans-unit.source: -or-

The property is of type <see cref="T:System.Object" /> or other reference type, <paramref name="defaultValue" /> is not <see langword="null" />, and the value cannot be assigned to the reference type.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的型別是 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 或其他參考型別、<paramref name="defaultValue" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，而且無法將此值指派給參考型別。

trans-unit.source: Sets a custom attribute.
trans-unit.target: 設定自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: An instance of a helper class to define the custom attribute.
trans-unit.target: 定義自訂屬性的協助程式類別執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Set a custom attribute using a custom attribute builder.
trans-unit.target: 使用自訂屬性產生器來設定自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="customBuilder" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="customBuilder" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: if <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> has been called on the enclosing type.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> 已在封入型別上呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The constructor for the custom attribute.
trans-unit.target: 自訂屬性的建構函式。

trans-unit.source: A byte blob representing the attributes.
trans-unit.target: 代表屬性的位元組 Blob。

trans-unit.source: Set a custom attribute using a specified custom attribute blob.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的自訂屬性 Blob 來設定自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: See the metadata specification in the ECMA Partition II documentation for details on how to format `binaryAttribute`.
trans-unit.target: 有關如何格式化，請參閱 ECMA 第二篇文件以取得詳細資料中的中繼資料規格`binaryAttribute`。

trans-unit.source: The Partition II documentation is available online on MSDN ([ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=65555) Web page) and on the ECMA Web site ([Standard ECMA-335 Common Language Infrastructure](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=65552) document).
trans-unit.target: 第二篇文件上可用的線上 MSDN ([ECMA C# 和通用語言基礎結構標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=65555)網頁上) 在 ECMA 網站 ([標準 ecma-335 通用語言基礎結構](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=65552)文件）。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="con" /> or <paramref name="binaryAttribute" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="con" /> 或 <paramref name="binaryAttribute" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> has been called on the enclosing type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> 已在封入型別上被呼叫。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="MethodBuilder" /> object that represents the method that gets the property value.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="MethodBuilder" /> 物件，表示取得屬性值的方法。

trans-unit.source: Sets the method that gets the property value.
trans-unit.target: 設定會取得屬性值的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates how to attach a dynamic method to a `get` property created with `PropertyBuilder` using `SetGetMethod`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何將連接的動態方法`get`屬性以建立`PropertyBuilder`使用`SetGetMethod`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="mdBuilder" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="mdBuilder" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> has been called on the enclosing type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> 已在封入型別上被呼叫。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="MethodBuilder" /> object that represents the method that sets the property value.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="MethodBuilder" /> 物件，表示設定屬性值的方法。

trans-unit.source: Sets the method that sets the property value.
trans-unit.target: 設定會設定屬性值的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates how to attach a dynamic method to a `set` property created with `PropertyBuilder` using `SetSetMethod`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何將連接的動態方法`set`屬性以建立`PropertyBuilder`使用`SetSetMethod`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="mdBuilder" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="mdBuilder" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> has been called on the enclosing type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> 已在封入型別上被呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Sets the property value for the given object to the given value.
trans-unit.target: 設定指定物件的屬性值為指定值。

trans-unit.source: The object whose property value will be set.
trans-unit.target: 將設定其屬性值的物件。

trans-unit.source: The new value for this property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的新值。

trans-unit.source: Optional index values for indexed properties.
trans-unit.target: 索引屬性的選擇性索引值。

trans-unit.source: This value should be <see langword="null" /> for non-indexed properties.
trans-unit.target: 非索引屬性的這個值應為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the property with optional index values for index properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用索引屬性的選擇性索引值設定屬性值。

trans-unit.source: To set the value of a property, reflect on the property's parent type using <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, retrieve the <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo> object from the type, and call <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.SetValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定屬性的值，反映在父屬性上使用下列方法類型<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，擷取<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>物件類型，並呼叫從<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.SetValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This method is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The object whose property value will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 其屬性值將被傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The new value for this property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的新值。

trans-unit.source: The invocation attribute.
trans-unit.target: 引動過程屬性。

trans-unit.source: This must be a bit flag from <see langword="BindingFlags" /> : <see langword="InvokeMethod" />, <see langword="CreateInstance" />, <see langword="Static" />, <see langword="GetField" />, <see langword="SetField" />, <see langword="GetProperty" />, or <see langword="SetProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: 這必須是 <see langword="BindingFlags" /> 中的位元旗標：<see langword="InvokeMethod" />、<see langword="CreateInstance" />、<see langword="Static" />、<see langword="GetField" />、<see langword="SetField" />、<see langword="GetProperty" /> 或 <see langword="SetProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: A suitable invocation attribute must be specified.
trans-unit.target: 您必須指定適當的引動過程屬性。

trans-unit.source: If a static member is to be invoked, the <see langword="Static" /> flag of <see langword="BindingFlags" /> must be set.
trans-unit.target: 如果將要叫用靜態成員，則必須設定 <see langword="Static" /> 的 <see langword="BindingFlags" /> 旗標。

trans-unit.source: An object that enables the binding, coercion of argument types, invocation of members, and retrieval of <see langword="MemberInfo" /> objects using reflection.
trans-unit.target: 使用反映來啟用繫結、強制引數的類型、成員的引動過程，和擷取 <see langword="MemberInfo" /> 物件的物件。

trans-unit.source: If <c>binder</c> is <see langword="null" />, the default binder is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>Binder</c> 為 <see langword="null" />，則會使用預設 Binder。

trans-unit.source: Optional index values for indexed properties.
trans-unit.target: 索引屬性的選擇性索引值。

trans-unit.source: This value should be <see langword="null" /> for non-indexed properties.
trans-unit.target: 非索引屬性的這個值應為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="CultureInfo" /> object that represents the culture for which the resource is to be localized.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="CultureInfo" /> 物件，表示資源將要為其當地語系化的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the resource is not localized for this culture, the <see langword="CultureInfo.Parent" /> method will be called successively in search of a match.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，如果並未為這個文化特性將資源當地語系化，則將在搜尋相符項目時持續呼叫 <see langword="CultureInfo.Parent" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: If this value is <see langword="null" />, the <see langword="CultureInfo" /> is obtained from the <see langword="CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個值為 <see langword="null" />，則 <see langword="CultureInfo" /> 是取自 <see langword="CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the property value for the given object to the given value.
trans-unit.target: 設定指定物件的屬性值為指定值。

trans-unit.source: To set the value of a property, reflect on the property's parent type using <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, retrieve the <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo> object from the type, and call <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.SetValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定屬性的值，反映在父屬性上使用下列方法類型<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，擷取<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>物件類型，並呼叫從<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.SetValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This method is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Reserved for future use.
trans-unit.target: 保留供未來使用。

trans-unit.source: Must be IID_NULL.
trans-unit.target: 必須是 IID_NULL。

trans-unit.source: Passed-in array of names to be mapped.
trans-unit.target: 要對應之傳入的名稱陣列。

trans-unit.source: Count of the names to be mapped.
trans-unit.target: 要對應的名稱計數。

trans-unit.source: The locale context in which to interpret the names.
trans-unit.target: 用於解譯名稱的地區設定內容。

trans-unit.source: Caller-allocated array which receives the IDs corresponding to the names.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端配置的陣列，用於接收對應於名稱的 ID。

trans-unit.source: Maps a set of names to a corresponding set of dispatch identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 將一組名稱對應至一組對應的分派識別項 (Dispatch Identifier)。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: The method is called late-bound using the COM <c>IDispatch</c> interface.
trans-unit.target: 方法使用 COM <c>IDispatch</c> 介面進行晚期繫結呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The type information to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回的類型資訊。

trans-unit.source: The locale identifier for the type information.
trans-unit.target: 類型資訊的地區設定識別項。

trans-unit.source: Receives a pointer to the requested type information object.
trans-unit.target: 接收要求的類型資訊物件的指標。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the type information for an object, which can then be used to get the type information for an interface.
trans-unit.target: 擷取物件的類型資訊，可以用來取得介面的類型資訊。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::GetTypeInfo`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`IDispatch::GetTypeInfo`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: The method is called late-bound using the COM <c>IDispatch</c> interface.
trans-unit.target: 方法使用 COM <c>IDispatch</c> 介面進行晚期繫結呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Points to a location that receives the number of type information interfaces provided by the object.
trans-unit.target: 指向接收物件提供的類型資訊介面數目的位置。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the number of type information interfaces that an object provides (either 0 or 1).
trans-unit.target: 擷取物件提供的類型資訊介面數目 (0 或 1)。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::GetTypeInfoCount`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`IDispatch::GetTypeInfoCount`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: The method is called late-bound using the COM <c>IDispatch</c> interface.
trans-unit.target: 方法使用 COM <c>IDispatch</c> 介面進行晚期繫結呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the member.
trans-unit.target: 辨識成員。

trans-unit.source: Reserved for future use.
trans-unit.target: 保留供未來使用。

trans-unit.source: Must be IID_NULL.
trans-unit.target: 必須是 IID_NULL。

trans-unit.source: The locale context in which to interpret arguments.
trans-unit.target: 地區設定內容，用於解譯引數。

trans-unit.source: Flags describing the context of the call.
trans-unit.target: 描述呼叫之內容的旗標。

trans-unit.source: Pointer to a structure containing an array of arguments, an array of argument DISPIDs for named arguments, and counts for the number of elements in the arrays.
trans-unit.target: 結構的指標，此結構包含引數陣列、指名引數之 DISPID 引數的陣列，以及陣列中項目數目的計數。

trans-unit.source: Pointer to the location where the result is to be stored.
trans-unit.target: 指向用於儲存結果之位置的指標。

trans-unit.source: Pointer to a structure that contains exception information.
trans-unit.target: 包含例外狀況資訊的結構指標。

trans-unit.source: The index of the first argument that has an error.
trans-unit.target: 第一個有錯誤的引數索引。

trans-unit.source: Provides access to properties and methods exposed by an object.
trans-unit.target: 提供物件所公開的屬性和方法的存取權。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::Invoke`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`IDispatch::Invoke`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: The method is called late-bound using the COM <c>IDispatch</c> interface.
trans-unit.target: 方法使用 COM <c>IDispatch</c> 介面進行晚期繫結呼叫。
